T10D4173:4a-5: ji ltar chu srin kha ru rgya mtsho'i gzings rgyug bzhin du mi 'dod kyang //
T10D4173:4a-6: rmongs pa bdag 'dra las kyi dbang gis 'chi bdag
T10D4173:4a-7: kha ru rings par rgyug / snying rje med pa'i
T10D4173:4a-8: 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'gro ba gzhan yang de bzhin
T10D4173:4a-9: mi dra // de phyir cung zad skrag pa'i yid kyis dge ba'i bshes la 'dir phyag 'tshal //
T10D4173:4a-10: mkha' la nyi ma'i zer gyis zil pa bzhin du bdag gi tshe yi tshad //
T10D4173:4a-11: ring por gnas pa'i mthu med las dang 'bras bu grib ma bzhin du 'brang //
T10D4173:4a-12: sha khon yod pa'i dgra bzhin gshin rje'i tshogs rnams dga' ba'i bzhin gyis lta //
T10D4173:4a-13: de tshe nye du rnams kyang por zhing bdag nyid kho na skrag cing 'gro //
T10D4173:4a-14: sngan chad shi ba'ang bshes dang 'grogs pa ma mthong rgan rabs dag las min //
T10D4173:4a-15: lung las ma gsungs phyis kyang mi 'byung da ltar bdag la gdeng ci yod //
T10D4173:4a-16: gson tshe 'dir ni tshong khang chen por 'dus pa'i skye bo bzhin du 'gro //
T10D4173:4a-17: kva yi sems khyod bag med ma byed glo bur ba des khyod ni gzung bar long //
T10D4173:4a-18: deng sang skye bo phal cher rnyed dang bkur stis 'chums shing bdud dbang song //
T10D4173:4b-0: @4b ngan song rgya mtsho 'phel zhing dkar po'i phyogs 'grib lha rnams smre sngags 'don //
T10D4173:4b-1: sdom brtson can dag bslab las lhod cing khyim ba dag gi pho nyar 'gro //
T10D4173:4b-2: lha min phyogs 'phel nag po'i klu yis nad rnams sna tshogs gtong bar 'gyur //
T10D4173:4b-3: de tshe 'gro ba bskyab pa'i don brtson thugs rje can gyi bcom ldan 'das //
T10D4173:4b-4: bsnyel ba mi mnga' de la dga' ba'i bzhin gyis sems khyod skyabs su deng //
T10D4173:4b-5: dper na rje bo'i las la bran gyis bzhin du thugs rje can gyis don //
T10D4173:4b-6: mdzad pa gang yin de la bdag gis shes bya yang dang yang du bslab //
T10D4173:4b-7: 'gro ba mgu bas thams cad mkhyen pa mnyis par bla ma de skad gsungs //
T10D4173:4b-8: de mnyes byas pas bdag don 'gyur na de la sems khyod ci zhig skyo //
T10D4173:4b-9: don lnga bsdus pa'i gtam 'di bdag sems gdul ba'i ched du nges par byas //
T10D4173:4b-10: bsod nams de yis 'gro ba ma lus sangs rgyas spyan rnams thob par shog /
T10D4173:4b-11: ched du brjod pa'i gtam drang srong chen po zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
